inline.description:
Test on iOS and Android
Mobile apps, share extension
  1. Log on to iOS and Android RN apps
  2. Set "Max File Size" to "1", Save
  3.  On each mobile device, view an image file you know is larger than 1MB, tap to share, select Mattermost

Android: Verify error message
iOS: Select team and channel, tap to send
inline.testData: iOSAndroid
inline.expectedResult:
Message displays:
  • Android ➜ "File attachments shared in Mattermost must be less than 1024 KB."
  • iOS ➜ "File attachments shared in Mattermost must be less than 1 MB."

customFields.Related ticket(s): Regression: RN iOS: No error message when sharing an image larger than max file size — MM-21613
